\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 62963}

\subsection*{I'm Sure Glad I Use It}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{2295019}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 100 mg & oral & Ginkgo biloba & daily\\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 & 500 mg & oral & Phosphatidylserine & daily\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 210.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I just recently cut back on smoking weed, too much short term memory loss. I started using Ginko \& Phosphatedtidyserine to help my memory as well as combat my very annoying lifelong allergies, what I felt has been nothing short of a miracle. My Allergies has lessened alot and so has my athsma and I can remember alot better. I had got this product from the company I work for and man I would not go a day without it. It gives me a energized euphoric feeling that I've never felt from anything.

\end{document}
